channel.title: Possibly the Best thing I've ever created.
channel.description:
I felt this deserved it's own thread. :fffuuu:
I've been working on a film for the last 3 years, And now, The introduction has been done. (No. It didn't take me 3 years to make the introduction. It took me 5 months) The film is set for release in June 2010.
Special Thanks to: Andrew Kramer And Alex Verlan
Song used: Attack - Pearl Harbour Soundtrack.
Download it from iTunes: [url]https://itunes.apple.com/WebObjects/MZStore.woa/wa/viewAlbum?i=98415559&id=98416611&s=143444[/url]
[align=center][youtube]vpREE6slDnE[/youtube][/align]

item.source: Possibly the Best thing I've ever created.

item.title: Possibly the Best thing I've ever created.
item.dc:creator: _amp_955_dam
item.description:
mattemuse:

“Blends into the first scene?” Is it meant to loop?

No, but the sound has to go on into the first scene of the film, And the black will be removed.

mattemuse:

This happened to me the one time I tried to use afterFX. Its because white is being used for transparency, and your background color is black. Don’t ask me how to fix this, I ended up saying fuck it because I’d gone without sleep for a week trying to finish the motherfucker.

Oh yeah, I feel you. I was awake for 4 days in row making the first part, and 2 days making the second part… That’s why I don’t want to fix any mistakes for a while, But there WILL be an improved version.

Read full topic
item.source: Possibly the Best thing I've ever created.

item.title: Possibly the Best thing I've ever created.
item.dc:creator: mattemuse
item.description:
λdam:

Right, Thanks.
The end with it being black blends into the first scene, So that is why it is there.

“Blends into the first scene?” Is it meant to loop?

λdam:

In the After Effects project, the Text is white, and it came out black.

This happened to me the one time I tried to use afterFX. Its because white is being used for transparency, and your background color is black. Don’t ask me how to fix this, I ended up saying fuck it because I’d gone without sleep for a week trying to finish the motherfucker.

Read full topic
item.source: Possibly the Best thing I've ever created.

item.title: Possibly the Best thing I've ever created.
item.dc:creator: _amp_955_dam
item.description:
mattemuse:

thats harsh. lololol

Uh, my two cents-

  1. The “Chankon IV” title really needs some backlighting or something to make it stand out from the background. Its easy to misread, the first time I saw it I thought it said “Chankon TV”

  2. The 8 seconds of black at the end of the video seems unneccesary.

Right, Thanks.
The end with it being black blends into the first scene, So that is why it is there.

Yeah, It can be easy to misread, In the After Effects project, the Text is white, and it came out black. ¬.¬
Strange.

Read full topic

  2. The 8 seconds of black at the end of the video seems unneccesary.
